RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: select ac_gl_no,ac_gl_ccy,ac_gl_desc from oltbs_account where (branch_code is not null or ac_or_gl = 'G') and gl_aclass_type <> '5' and ac_gl_rec_status = 'O' and auth_stat='A'
select ccy_code ,ccy_name from cytms_ccy_defn order by ccy_code
SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_TYPE='F' AND AUTH_STAT='A' AND RECORD_STAT='O' AND MODULE = 'LP'

SELECT A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, B.PARTICIPANT_PRODUCT, C.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION OFFSET_PROD_DESC FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT A, OLTM_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD B, OLTMS_PRODUCT C WHERE A.PRODUCT_TYPE IN ('C') AND A.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND A.RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND A.MODULE = 'LB' AND A.PRODUCT_CODE = B.PRODUCT AND C.PRODUCT_CODE = B.PARTICIPANT_PRODUCT

SELECT A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, B.PARTICIPANT_PRODUCT, C.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION OFFSET_PROD_DESC FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT A, OLTM_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD B, OLTMS_PRODUCT C WHERE A.PRODUCT_TYPE IN ('L') AND A.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND A.RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND A.MODULE = 'LB' AND A.PRODUCT_CODE = B.PRODUCT AND C.PRODUCT_CODE = B.PARTICIPANT_PRODUCT
select disclosure_code,disclosure_description from lbtms_disclosure where auth_stat = 'A' and record_stat = 'O'
SELECT FIN_CENTRE,FIN_CENTRE_DESC FROM OLTM_FIN_CENTRE WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND AUTH_STAT='A'
